name: google-api-test-suite
description: Comprehensive Google Workspace API testing for Entropy Automation System

scripts.test:sheets: node -e "const {SheetsAPITester, GoogleAuthManager} = require('./Google_API_Test_Suite.js'); (async () => { const auth = new GoogleAuthManager(); await auth.initialize(); const tester = new SheetsAPITester(auth); await tester.runAllTests(); })()"
scripts.test:drive: node -e "const {DriveAPITester, GoogleAuthManager} = require('./Google_API_Test_Suite.js'); (async () => { const auth = new GoogleAuthManager(); await auth.initialize(); const tester = new DriveAPITester(auth); await tester.runAllTests(); })()"

author: API Integration Specialist
